mapper.select: select a.*,c.sp_name from cg_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cg_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=#{status} and a.history=1
mapper.update: update cg_contract set contract_name=#{cg.contractName}, cg_no=#{cg.cgNo}, cgd_no=#{cg.cgdNo}, work_no=#{cg.workNo}, prj_name=#{cg.prjName}, is_program=#{cg.isProgram}, program_type=#{cg.programType}, cgc_type=#{cg.cgcType}, program_money=#{cg.programMoney}, cg_contract_money=#{cg.cgContractMoney}, contract_name_jia=#{cg.contractNameJia}, contract_name_yi=#{cg.contractNameYi}, pay_mode=#{cg.payMode}, contract_sign_time=#{cg.contractSignTime}, contract_summary=#{cg.contractSummary}, work_content=#{cg.workContent}, fb_no=#{cg.fbNo}, cg_department=#{cg.cgDepartment}, freight=#{cg.freight}, borrow_no=#{cg.borrowNo} where cg_id=#{cg.cgId}
mapper.select: select *,c.sp_name from cg_contract a left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where cg_id=#{id}

select cg_id,cg_no,contract_name,prj_name,work_no,c.sp_name from cg_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cg_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.history=1
select cg_no from cg_contract where cg_id=#{id}
select a.*,c.sp_name from cg_contract a left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where a.cg_no=#{cgNo} and a.history=0
select count(1) from (select distinct cg_no from cg_contract where cg_no like #{year}) as a

select cg_id,contract_name,cg_no,cgd_no,prj_name,work_no,contract_name_yi,c.sp_name,cg_contract_money from cg_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cg_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.history=1
select cg_id,cgd_no,contract_name,work_no,contract_name_yi,prj_name,cg_contract_money from cg_contract where cg_no=#{cgNo} and history=1
select cg_no,cgd_no,work_no,prj_name from cg_contract where contract_name=#{contractName} and history=1
select cg_id,cg_no,contract_name,prj_name from cg_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cg_id =b.mode_id where a.work_no=#{no} and a.history=1 and b.status=2
select cg_id,cg_no,work_no,contract_name from cg_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cg_id =b.mode_id where a.prj_name=#{name} and a.history=1 and b.status=2
select *,c.sp_name from cg_contract a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cg_id=b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.cg_no=#{no} and a.history=1

SELECT contract_name,cg_no,cgc_type,cg_contract_money,c.sp_name FROM cg_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cg_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN sourcing_purchasing as c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and work_no like #{no} and a.history=1
mapper.update: UPDATE cg_contract SET history=0 where cg_no =(select a.cg_no from (SELECT cg_no from cg_contract WHERE cg_id=#{id}) AS a)
UPDATE cg_contract SET history=1 where cg_id=#{id}

UPDATE cg_contract set
work_no=#{cg.workNo},
prj_name=#{cg.prjName},
fb_no=#{cg.fbNo},
borrow_no=#{cg.borrowNo},
program_type=#{cg.programType},
program_money=#{cg.programMoney}
where cg_id=#{cg.cgId}
mapper.select: select * from cg_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cg_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and a.cg_no=#{cgNo} and a.history=1
